Name: Hiddens Awakening
About the game: The legend tells that behind every tree, every rock, there are Hiddens, mythical creatures, guardians of nature. That day, the Howler Hidden regains consciousness in the forest, and discovers that his world has changedâ€¦ Can you save the Hiddens from extinction, organize the resistance, and get the situation under control ? Discover this new single player turn-based strategy game with a focus on infiltration and reflexion. Build and expand the Grindill colony to gain a tactical advantage in the levels, and become the ruthless shadow of the forests. There is no chance, no dice roll in Hiddens, every action will always have the same result. Your success depends solely on your strategy. ITDL Games is a small independent team located near Lille in France. Hiddens Awakening is our first game and we gave it all to offer you a special experience. Enjoy playing !
